refnamediv.refpurpose: Simple debugging console for a Palm Handheld device (deprecated).

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: (deprecated)debugsh is a Command-line interface to the Palm debug monitor. Use device file /dev/tty<0..n> to communicate with the Palm handheld. If this is not specified, debugsh will output a simple usage help message.

blockquote.para: Returns the number of databases on the PDA card.
Returns the names of databases on the Palm.

refsect1.title: Usage
refsect1.para: The program will connect to your Palm handheld and give the user an interactive prompt (a "shell") for executing debugging commands.
